name: EDDSWORLD: The Masquerade
description:
English/Русский язык

A crossover AU between "Eddsworld" and "Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines". Share the adventures of four vampires who have to put their differences aside in order to survive in the world of darkness. Dark places, dark secrets, dark humour...everything is dark around here!

by pirran

https://eddsworld-the-masquerade.tumblr.com/
